prompt1: Objective:I would like to update my resume to align my skills, professional experience, and academic projects with the job description. Please make the necessary changes and additions to optimize my resume for this role and incorporate the most important keywords from the job description in my achievements. Job Description:

Specific Instructions:

Skills Alignment: Identify the skills mentioned in the job description and add them to the appropriate section of my resume. Ensure the skills are accurately represented and highlight any relevant experiences that demonstrate proficiency in these skills. Keep the format of the skill section as in resume (Four sections: Programming Languages, Data Frameworks, Application Software, Tools and Libraries).

Professional Experience: Adjust the descriptions of my previous job roles to better match the responsibilities and requirements outlined in the job description. Emphasize achievements and experiences that are most relevant to the new role. Write 6 points for this section.

Academic Projects: Revise the descriptions of my academic projects to align with the requirements and qualifications sought in the job description. Highlight any technical expertise or problem-solving abilities demonstrated during these projects that are relevant to the new role. Write two points for each project and keep the length od points same as resume points.

Please ensure that the changes made to my resume maintain a professional tone, proper grammar, and accurate representation of my qualifications and experiences. Write only the Professional Experience, Skills, and Academic Projects sections. Do not write any other section. Add 10 most important keywords from the job description into my resume.

Thank you for your assistance in optimizing my resume for this specific job opportunity.
